ValidationRule.description: Care Expert Note is not editable anymore when status = Prelimary Quote Validated and following statuses
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Care_Expert_Note__c ) , NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'New Request'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Assigned'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Pending Customer information'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Initiated in MyRepairs as a Draft'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Created in MyRepairs'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Preliminary Quote Pending Validation') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Care Expert’s note has already been approved by the Client, it can’t be modified anymore
